description:
The course will include an introduction to the basics of ETF's and how to invest in them. By the end of the course you will be able to apply this knowledge by reviewing specific ETF's and how they can be used in a portfolio.

The course will take around one hour to complete.

This course is of interest to anyone who wants to learn the basics about ETF's, to serve as a foundation for more advanced topics.
title: Basics of ETF Investing
